_sText:
MAP UPADTED:
==================
-Spawn killer fixeed, it now kills instantly,
==================
-spawn killer appears 3 seconds earlier.
==================


Soooo, this is my new course map for CS:S.
I've spent some time making  this map and I hope you'll leave comments and rating.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
<iframe width="520" height="293" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/3xPCeys0SUA?feature=player_detailpage" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Map includes a few secrets (one of them is acttually shown in the video, but it's hard to get there).

I hope you  will enjoy :)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
